videos.description: Jordan Poole finds Kevon Looney with the feed for a powerful dunk vs. Grizzlies.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Poole feeds to Looney for the strong two-handed jam) 2022/05/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Poole feeds to Looney for the strong two-handed jam

videos.description: Jaren Jackson Jr. shows off his defensive acumen with an impressive block on Jordan Poole.

videos.description: Steph Curry becomes the first player in NBA postseason history to reach 500 made 3-pointers.

videos.description: Draymond Green denies Jaren Jackson Jr.'s 3-point attempt as the Warriors take down the Grizzlies.

videos.description: Steph Curry and the Warriors rally late to grab the 101-98 win over the Grizzlies in Game 4.
